overview: Jean-Claude is the lusty race car champion whose pistons pound on and off the track! Adopted daughter Angel wants to take over Dad’s torrid title… but first this heavenly honey lubes car fancier Joey Silvera’s super-charged hot rod. The pace and passion speed up to 150 mph when a beautiful reporter arrives on the scene. And when French superstar Marilyn Jess finally nabs Jean-Claude, the sexual sound-barrier is broken! So fasten your seat belts and check out this wild, wanton winner.
title: Grand Prixxx
